  • java.lang.Object

    public class OLSOntologyHelper
extends AbstractOntologyHelper
    OLS-specific implementation of OntologyHelper.

    Matt Pearce

      • checkTerm

        protected void checkTerm​(java.lang.String iri)
                  throws OntologyHelperException
        Check whether a term is in the terms cache and, if not, attempt to add it.
        Parameters:
        iri - the IRI to look up.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur looking up the IRI.

      • lookupTerms

        protected java.util.List<OntologyTerm> lookupTerms​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> iris)
                                            throws OntologyHelperException
        Look up a collection of terms in OLS.
        Parameters:
        iris - the terms to be queried.
        Returns:
        a list of those terms which were found.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if the lookup is interrupted.

      • isIriInOntology

        public boolean isIriInOntology​(java.lang.String iri)
                        throws OntologyHelperException
        Description copied from interface: OntologyHelper
        Check whether an IRI exists in the ontology (or ontologies) represented by this helper.
        Parameters:
        iri - the IRI to look for.
        Returns:
        true if the class corresponding to this IRI can be found, false if not.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur finding the IRI in the ontology.

      • findLabels

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> findLabels​(java.lang.String iri)
                                                  throws OntologyHelperException
        Description copied from interface: OntologyHelper
        Find the labels for a single OWL class.
        Parameters:
        iri - the IRI of the class whose labels are required.
        Returns:
        a collection of labels for the class. Never null.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur accessing the ontology.

      • queryWebServiceForTerms

        protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> queryWebServiceForTerms​(java.lang.String baseUrl)
                                                           throws OntologyHelperException
        Find the IRIs of all terms referenced by a related URL.
        Parameters:
        baseUrl - the base URL to look up, from a Link or similar query-type URL.
        Returns:
        a set of IRIs referencing the terms found for the given URL.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur accessing the web service.

      • buildPageUrls

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> buildPageUrls​(java.lang.String baseUrl,
                                                         int firstPage,
                                                         int lastPage)
        Build a list of URLs for a range of pages.
        Parameters:
        baseUrl - the base URL; the page size and page number will be appended to this as query parameters.
        firstPage - the first page in the range, inclusive.
        lastPage - the last page in the range, exclusive.
        Returns:
        the list of generated URLs.

      • getRelations

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>> getRelations​(java.lang.String iri)
                                                                                    throws OntologyHelperException
        Description copied from interface: OntologyHelper
        Retrieve a map of related classes for a particular class.
        Parameters:
        iri - the IRI of the class whose relations are required.
        Returns:
        a map of relation type to a list of IRIs for nodes with that relationship.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur accessing the ontology.
